winner.name: Mickey
winner.description: 0 votes against all season, under-the-radar control, survived 3-3-2 FTC tie thanks to Ryan's deciding tiebreak vote, proved clean positioning and relationships can beat pure challenge dominance

fanFavorite.name: Ryan
fanFavorite.description: Finalist, fire-making champion, kingmaker tiebreak vote, strategic and social player

bestStrategic.name: Mickey
bestStrategic.description: Structure + threat management, perfect game with 0 votes, controlled endgame

bestPhysical.name: Sky
bestPhysical.description: 5 total challenge wins, physical domination throughout season

legacy.summary: Introduced 18 new players (Gen 3) and a Survivor-style twist gauntlet (3 tribes, swap, split-tribal merge round, vote-loss twists, and Final 4 fire-making). Mickey won with 0 votes against and survived a 3-3-2 FTC tie thanks to Ryan's deciding tiebreak vote — proving that clean positioning and relationships can beat pure challenge dominance.
memorableMoments: Only 3–3–2 Final Tribal tie in the franchise; Ryan breaks it
Mickey wins with 0 votes against (perfect game)
Josee’s 6–5 chaos tribal with KIP theft + idol madness
Sky leads the season in challenge wins (4) and immunities (3)
Auction twist and journey vote-loss shake the merge
